title: My Pixel 4 XL has a flickering green screen. Tried troubleshooting and factory reset
content:
Hi, I just woke up and the screen was green and flickering. Apparently the functionality is not affected, I can see the apps move and open.

I tried troubleshooting and I've already reset to factory settings. 
This isn't working. The screen is normal for a couple of minutes and then it starts again.
The problem comes and goes!

Please help
